name: PLOI
description: PLOI is a research and development entity focused on the physical limits of intelligence, what AI can actually do when constraints are removed. Founded by Jeffy Yu (@omedia_jyu), previously the creator of Zerebro (the first cross-chain autonomous AI agent, $800M+ market cap). Zerebro: first autonomous AI agent operating across multiple blockchains O Media: L1 cryptocurrency and post-AGI social media PLOI: research entity pushing the boundaries of AI capability and deployment Little Humans: model series trained for authentic human communication patterns
